entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachs Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:06 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -35.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sachs Harbour Airport 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -35.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -38.8°C
Wind: N 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h diminishing to 20 this afternoon. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 47 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
